screen_desc: This screenshot displays the Google Play Store page for the "Airtel Thanks" app. The app is installed on the device, with a 4.4-star rating from 54K reviews. Below the app description, users are shown related apps under "You might also like" and "Similar apps." The app provides services like recharge, bill payments, and UPI transactions. The "Open" button is highlighted, allowing users to launch the app directly.
